column1: Does anyone know if there has been any Coronavirus cases in Afandou?
I live in Afandou. There are no cases there. Only 3 reported on the island
Hi can you give me some advice on how and where to rent an apt or small house for 3 to six months next year it doesn't need to be near a resort
Try Airbnb.As its only short term.
Thank you Trevor Would be great if you could keep me updated
I have sent you a PM.
